item.title: Minot, North Dakota flooding information
item.description: Updated again 10:00 a.m. ET, Friday, June 24, 2011 Updated throughout at 9:00pm Eastern Time, June 22, 2011 How many people are affected by the flooding? 12,000 people are in the evacuation zone anticipating an alert for immediate evacuation on June 22, 2011 (Reuters). Evacuations started June 1. The population of Minot is about 40,000. Among the organizations affected by the flood is the Minot Air Force Base, which has opened a 24x7 emergency center to assist military families (MAFB).
